verbose_text: Another study provided some important information about the suppression of adiponectin on the oncogenic actions of leptin in HCC [XREF_BIBR] : (1) Adiponectin treatment reduced leptin induced Stat3 and Akt phosphorylation and increased suppressor of cytokine signaling (SOCS3), a physiologic negative regulator of leptin signal transduction.
evidence: Adiponectin treatment reduced leptin-induced Stat3 and Akt phosphorylation
